titleStmt.title: A true account of the types of His Majesties printing-house, belonging to the Heirs and Successors of Andrew Anderson, His Majesties Printer; consisting of several sorts. All added since the year 1694.
titleStmt.author: Heirs and Successors of Andrew Anderson.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Heirs and Successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, City and Colledge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
